author: Katie Pavlich
title: Poll: Americans Are Accepting That Mexico Isn't Paying For The Border Wall
text:
Share Tweet 
According to a new survey from Pew Research , the majority of Democrats and most Republican voters do not believe Mexico will ultimately pay for President Trump's wall on the southern border: 
When asked about Mexico's payment   breakfast in Washington Thursday morning,   laughed at the idea. Does Mitch McConnell believe Mexico will pay for a wall along the border?"Uh, no," he said before laughing https://t.co/uV6Qgmqbgc pic.twitter.com/6yY0rUfLlt â€” CNN (@CNN) March 9, 2017 
Estimates peg the border wall at a cost between $15-20 billion. Hundreds of construction companies, including over a dozen Hispanic-American owned companies, have submitted bids for the massive project. 
President Trump repeatedly promised on the campaign trail Mexico would pay for the wall, either directly or indirectly. The White House reiterated Thursday afternoon that the wall is happening, despite border crossing dropping by 40 percent under President Trump's short tenure.
